alert.note: Alert for Spotsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 16 at 9:36PM EDT until June 17 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM EDT FRIDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Virginia and northwest Virginia, including the following counties: in central Virginia, Orange and Spotsylvania. In northwest Virginia, Madison. * WHEN...Until 1230 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 936 PM EDT, emergency management reported heavy rain in Orange due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 2 and 4.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orange... Nasons... Madison Run... Lahore... Madison Mills... Unionville... Montford... Thornhill... Montpelier Station... Twymans Mill... Old Somerset... Aroda... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
